alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 4:43PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo and Coconino Counties for areas just north of Winslow through 530 PM MST... At 439 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Tolani Lake, or 20 miles north of Winslow, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy snow with intensity rates of 2 to 4 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy snow will lead to whiteout conditions and visibility as low as 1/4 mile. In cloud lightning is also occurring with this storm. Locations impacted include... Dilkon and Castle Butte. This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 363 and 379. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Driving withing the advised area will be hazardous.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
